docs.abstract: What should women do with the latest findings that raise doubts about the value of surgery for certain lesions?
docs.snippet: What should women do with the latest findings that raise doubts about the value of surgery for certain lesions?

docs.lead_paragraph: An astonishing number of people die because of the delay or refusal to accept vaccination for themselves and their children.

headline.main: Children Die Because People Are Wrongly Afraid of Vaccines

docs.snippet: An astonishing number of people die because of the delay or refusal to accept vaccination for themselves and their children.

docs.lead_paragraph: Jimmy Carter, still sprightly at 90 years old, spoke about his cancer diagnosis, innovative treatment regimen and born-again Christian beliefs.

headline.main: Ailing Jimmy Carter ‘at Ease With Whatever Comes’
headline.print_headline: Ailing Carter Is ‘at Ease With Whatever Comes’

docs.abstract: Former Pres Jimmy Carter says cancer, which was removed from his liver, has spread to his brain but he will undergo further treatment; 90-year-old says he is 'at ease with whatever comes.'
docs.snippet: Jimmy Carter, still sprightly at 90 years old, spoke about his cancer diagnosis, innovative treatment regimen and born-again Christian beliefs.

byline.original: By RICHARD FAUSSET and ALAN BLINDER

docs.lead_paragraph: Scientists have finally figured out how the key gene tied to obesity makes people fat, a major discovery that could open the door to an entirely new approach to the problem beyond diet and exercise.

headline.main: Scientists Find How Obesity Gene Works, a Clue to Treatment
headline.print_headline: Scientists Find How Obesity Gene Works, a Clue to Treatment

docs.snippet: Scientists have finally figured out how the key gene tied to obesity makes people fat, a major discovery that could open the door to an entirely new approach to the problem beyond diet and exercise.

docs.lead_paragraph: Typhoid has broken out among residents of the Yarmouk Palestinian refugee camp in Syria, the United Nations said on Wednesday, warning of further disease outbreaks unless aid reached the camp because of the appalling conditions there.

headline.main: Typhoid Breaks Out in Syria's Yarmouk Camp, Situation Desperate: U.N.
headline.print_headline: Typhoid Breaks Out in Syria's Yarmouk Camp, Situation Desperate: U.N.

docs.snippet: Typhoid has broken out among residents of the Yarmouk Palestinian refugee camp in Syria, the United Nations said on Wednesday, warning of further disease outbreaks unless aid reached the camp because of the appalling conditions there.

docs.lead_paragraph: Officials in some Republican-controlled states want to end public funding for Planned Parenthood or to investigate it in response to videos claiming that it profits from fetal tissue sales.

headline.main: States Move to Cut Funds for Planned Parenthood
headline.print_headline: States Move to Cut Funds for Provider of Abortions

docs.abstract: Anti-abortion officials in many Republican-controlled states are attempting to block public funding for Planned Parenthood, or to mount investigations into organization; efforts are reaction to controversial video footage of Planned Parenthood officials discussing fetal tissue.
docs.snippet: Officials in some Republican-controlled states want to end public funding for Planned Parenthood or to investigate it in response to videos claiming that it profits from fetal tissue sales.

docs.lead_paragraph: A proposed international vaccine fund could help speed up research and save lives.
docs.snippet: A proposed international vaccine fund could help speed up research and save lives.
